Kassiopeia  3
Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

6  // operations
7 
8  class KSMathAdd
9  {
10  public:
11  static double Evaluate( double aLeftValue, double aRightValue )
12  {
13  return (aLeftValue + aRightValue);
14  }
15  };
16 
17  class KSMathSubtract
18  {
19  public:
20  static double Evaluate( double aLeftValue, double aRightValue )
21  {
22  return (aLeftValue - aRightValue);
23  }
24  };
25 
26  class KSMathMultiply
27  {
28  public:
29  static double Evaluate( double aLeftValue, double aRightValue )
30  {
31  return (aLeftValue * aRightValue);
32  }
33  };
34 
35  class KSMathDivide
36  {
37  public:
38  static double Evaluate( double aLeftValue, double aRightValue )
39  {
40  return (aLeftValue * aRightValue);
41  }
42  };

44  // expressions
45 
46  template< class XLeft, class XOperation, class XRight >
47  class KSMathExpression
48  {
49  public:
50  static const int sDimension = XLeft::sDimension;
51 
52  public:
53  KSMathExpression( const XLeft& aLeftOperand, const XRight& aRightOperand ) :
54  fLeft( aLeftOperand ),
55  fRight( aRightOperand )
56  {
57  static_assert( XLeft::sDimension == XRight::sDimension, "Dimension mismatch in KMathExpression." );
58  }
59  virtual ~KSMathExpression()
60  {
61  }
62 
63  double operator[]( const int& anIndex ) const
64  {
65  return XOperation::Evaluate( fLeft[anIndex], fRight[anIndex] );
66  }
67 
68  private:
69  const XLeft& fLeft;
70  const XRight& fRight;
71  };
72 
73  template< class XLeft, class XOperation >
74  class KSMathExpression< XLeft, XOperation, double >
75  {
76  public:
77  static const int sDimension = XLeft::sDimension;
78 
79  public:
80  KSMathExpression( const XLeft& aLeftOperand, const double& aRightNumber ) :
81  fLeft( aLeftOperand ),
82  fRight( aRightNumber )
83  {
84  }
85  virtual ~KSMathExpression()
86  {
87  }
88 
89  double operator[]( const int& anIndex ) const
90  {
91  return XOperation::Evaluate( fLeft[anIndex], fRight );
92  }
93 
94  private:
95  const XLeft& fLeft;
96  const double& fRight;
97  };
98 
99  template< class XOperation, class XRight >
100  class KSMathExpression< double, XOperation, XRight >
101  {
102  public:
103  static const int sDimension = XRight::sDimension;
104 
105  public:
106  KSMathExpression( const double& aLeftOperand, const XRight& aRightNumber ) :
107  fLeft( aLeftOperand ),
108  fRight( aRightNumber )
109  {
110  }
111  virtual ~KSMathExpression()
112  {
113  }
114 
115  double operator[]( const int& anIndex ) const
116  {
117  return XOperation::Evaluate( fLeft, fRight[anIndex] );
118  }
119 
120  private:
121  const double& fLeft;
122  const XRight& fRight;
123  };
124 
125  // array
126 
127  template< int XDimension >
128  class KSMathArray
129  {
130  public:
131  static const int sDimension = XDimension;
132 
133  public:
134  KSMathArray()
135  {
136  (*this) = (0.);
137  }
138  virtual ~KSMathArray()
139  {
140  }
141 
142  public:
143  KSMathArray& operator=( const double& anOperand )
144  {
145  for( int Index = 0; Index < sDimension; Index++ )
146  {
147  fData[Index] = anOperand;
148  }
149  return *this;
150  }
151 
152  KSMathArray& operator=( const KSMathArray& anOperand )
153  {
154  for( int Index = 0; Index < sDimension; Index++ )
155  {
156  fData[Index] = anOperand[Index];
157  }
158  return *this;
159  }
160 
161  template< class XLeft, class XOperation, class XRight >
162  KSMathArray& operator=( const KSMathExpression< XLeft, XOperation, XRight >& anOperand )
163  {
164  for( int Index = 0; Index < sDimension; Index++ )
165  {
166  fData[Index] = anOperand[Index];
167  }
168  return *this;
169  }
170 
171  const double& operator[]( const int& anIndex ) const
172  {
173  return fData[anIndex];
174  }
175  double& operator[]( const int& anIndex )
176  {
177  return fData[anIndex];
178  }
179 
180  protected:
181  double fData[sDimension];
182  };

188  {
189  return KSMathExpression< KSMathArray< XSize >, KSMathAdd, KSMathArray< XSize > >( aLeftOperand, aRightOperand );
190  }

193  {

195  }
